name: Monka Space
description:
During a space mission you've crashed your ship onto the planet of monkeys. Fight the monkeys, acquire unique weapons and defeat the monkey king!

Features

  • 3 levels with a boss fight at the end
  • Weapons with different mechanics
  • Fight! Die?! Repeat!

Monka Space is developed by Bitlag Studio, a small team located in the Netherlands. This shows how far you can get with building a 2.5D game; 2D Hand-drawn environmental assets with 3D character models.
